sections.name: FeaturesGrid
sections.heading: Why Extensibl Media? Because We Get It.

features.heading: Custom Design That Pops
features.description: Tired of cookie-cutter websites? We craft one-of-a-kind designs that reflect your brand's unique vibe. No templates, no shortcuts.

features.heading: Responsive & Mobile-First, Always
features.description: In a world where everyone’s glued to their phones, we make sure your site looks and works great on any screen. Thumbs up!

features.heading: SEO Magic Built Right In
features.description: A gorgeous site is useless if no one sees it. We bake in SEO from the start, so you don’t just look good—you get found.

features.heading: We’ve Got Your Back
features.description: From brainstorming to go-live and beyond, we stick around to keep your site fresh, fast, and in tip-top shape.

content.heading: Our Web Design Process: All Thrills, No Frills
content.subheading: From Idea to Launch, We’ve Got This
content.body: Let’s be real—a website isn’t just an online brochure. It’s your digital handshake, your 24/7 storefront. We make sure it’s a firm one. Our process is streamlined, efficient, and gets you from zero to live with zero headaches.

content.heading: SEO That Doesn’t Suck
content.subheading: Because What’s a Website Without Traffic?
content.body: If your website isn’t pulling in visitors, what’s the point? We integrate SEO from day one, so your site gets noticed by the right people—aka your future customers.

content.heading: Support That Doesn’t Disappear
content.body: Websites need love to keep them running smoothly. We’re here to handle the updates, fixes, and tweaks so you can focus on what you do best—running your business.

sections.name: FeaturesGrid
sections.heading: Pain Points We Eliminate (AKA The Stuff That Sucks)

features.heading: Outdated, Clunky Designs
features.description: If your website looks like it hasn’t been touched since 2010, it’s time for a refresh. We’ll make it sleek, modern, and a true reflection of your brand.

features.heading: Terrible Mobile Experience
features.description: Nothing says ‘bounce’ like a site that doesn’t work on mobile. We make sure your site is mobile-optimized, so you don’t miss out on any thumb-tapping customers.

features.heading: Slow as Molasses
features.description: A slow website is a no-go. We optimize your site to load fast, keeping visitors happy and search engines smiling.

features.heading: Invisible on Google
features.description: A pretty site doesn’t mean much if no one can find it. We tackle SEO so your site shows up where it should—at the top.
